feed.title: DefGuard Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.1.0
entry.content:
🎉 All Enterprise features are free! 🎉

All Enterprise features (within certain limits) are now free and do not require a license. Limits should be more than sufficient for home, small business, and student use. More details here.

Further improvements:

🔐 Ability to use external OIDC for secure remote enrollment and Desktop client configuration

🔏 External OIDC now supports code authorization flow - extending Custom OIDC support to Okta, JumpCloud, Zitadel and others..

🛜 Fixed IPv6 configuration in the Location settings

Please consider buying the enterprise license to support us!

The whole defguard team thanks you! 🫡

Detailed changes

  • Fix ipv6 input and database adminid constraints by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/851
  • Enable enterprise features when within certain limits by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/852
  • OpenID via Proxy by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/845
  • Add external oidc tests by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/855
  • Remove web3 functionality from frontend, update docs links by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/857

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/848

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.1.1
entry.content:
Quick fix release

  • Fix enterprise settings sometimes not taking effect immediately, log gateway's token rejection reason by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/865

🎉 1.1.x: All Enterprise features are free! 🎉

All Enterprise features (within certain limits) are now free and do not require a license. Limits should be more than sufficient for home, small business, and student use. More details here.

Further improvements:

🔐 Ability to use external OIDC for secure remote enrollment and Desktop client configuration

🔏 External OIDC now supports code authorization flow - extending Custom OIDC support to Okta, JumpCloud, Zitadel and others..

🛜 Fixed IPv6 configuration in the Location settings

Please consider buying the enterprise license to support us!

The whole defguard team thanks you! 🫡

Detailed changes

  • Fix ipv6 input and database adminid constraints by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/851
  • Enable enterprise features when within certain limits by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/852
  • OpenID via Proxy by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/845
  • Add external oidc tests by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/855
  • Remove web3 functionality from frontend, update docs links by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/857

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/848

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.1.2

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.1.3
entry.content:
Quick fix release

  • Allow usernames with minimum 1 character by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/878
  • Okta fixes - more about Okta integration in our docs - fallback to calling user-info if claims not present in the ID token by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/883

🎉 1.1.x: All Enterprise features are free! 🎉

All Enterprise features (within certain limits) are now free and do not require a license. Limits should be more than sufficient for home, small business, and student use. More details here.

Further improvements:

🔐 Ability to use external OIDC for secure remote enrollment and Desktop client configuration

🔏 External OIDC now supports code authorization flow - extending Custom OIDC support to Okta, JumpCloud, Zitadel and others..

🛜 Fixed IPv6 configuration in the Location settings

Detailed changes

  • Fix ipv6 input and database adminid constraints by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/851
  • Enable enterprise features when within certain limits by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/852
  • OpenID via Proxy by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/845
  • Add external oidc tests by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/855
  • Remove web3 functionality from frontend, update docs links by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/857

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/848

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.2

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.1.4
entry.content:
⚠️ WARNING: Please read the upgrade notes for version 1.1.4, as we've introduced a change which may require certain modifications before you update ⚠️

Upgrade notes: https://docs.defguard.net/admin-and-features/setting-up-your-instance/upgrading#any-previous-core-release-greater-than-core-1.1.4

What's Changed

Quick fix release

  • build-binaries is meant for X86_64 runner only by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/884
  • Make emails case insensitive by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/886

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4

🎉 1.1.x: All Enterprise features are free! 🎉

All Enterprise features (within certain limits) are now free and do not require a license. Limits should be more than sufficient for home, small business, and student use. More details here.

Further improvements:

🔐 Ability to use external OIDC for secure remote enrollment and Desktop client configuration

🔏 External OIDC now supports code authorization flow - extending Custom OIDC support to Okta, JumpCloud, Zitadel and others..

🛜 Fixed IPv6 configuration in the Location settings
